body:
For context I've looked at how this is handled by other http routers. It's mixed as to how default implementations behave, but generally is documented clearly with a configurable.

* [julienschmidt/httprouter](http://github.com/julienschmidt/httprouter) exposes a [RedirectTrailingSlash](http://godoc.org/github.com/julienschmidt/httprouter#Router.RedirectTrailingSlash) option and by default does do these redirects.
* [gorilla/mux](github.com/gorilla/mux) exposes a [StrictSlash](http://godoc.org/github.com/gorilla/mux#Router.StrictSlash) option and by default does not do these redirects.
